suite.name: Cadastro Test

test.name: Cenário: Cadastro com sucesso de Pessoa Física

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
kw.msg: Opening browser 'firefox' to base url 'http://127.0.0.1:5173'.
Firefox driver log is always forced to to: /Users/thomasvieira/Documents/workspace/robot-framework-demo/v3/reports/geckodriver-5.log

kw.name: Given I am on Bookstore Demo web site
Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.
kw.msg: Page title is 'Bookstore Demo'.

kw.name: And I go to log in or sign in page
Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking link 'Minha conta'.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Lorem ipsum' into text field 'id: register-name'.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'lorem@ipsum.com' into text field 'id: register-mail'.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing password into text field 'id: register-pass'.
Temporally setting log level to: NONE
Log level changed from NONE to INFO.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing password into text field 'id: register-confirm-pass'.
Temporally setting log level to: NONE
Log level changed from NONE to INFO.

kw.name: Select From List By Label
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``labels``.
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'id: register-user-type' by label Pessoa Física.

kw.name: Submit Form
kw.doc: Submits a form identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Submitting form 'name: register'.

kw.name: Then I should see a success message
Wait Until Page Contains
kw.arg: Lorem ipsum, teu cadastro foi realizado com sucesso!
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: And I should see My Wish List
Page Should Contain Link
kw.doc: Verifies link identified by ``locator`` is found from current page.
kw.msg: Current page contains link '/my-wish-list'.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.name: Cenário: Cadastro com sucesso de Pessoa Jurídica

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
kw.msg: Opening browser 'firefox' to base url 'http://127.0.0.1:5173'.
Firefox driver log is always forced to to: /Users/thomasvieira/Documents/workspace/robot-framework-demo/v3/reports/geckodriver-6.log

kw.name: Given Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking link 'Minha conta'.

kw.name: When Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Lorem ipsum LTDA' into text field 'id: register-name'.

kw.name: And Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'contact@ipsum.com' into text field 'id: register-mail'.

kw.name: And Input Password
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing password into text field 'id: register-confirm-pass'.
Temporally setting log level to: NONE
Log level changed from NONE to INFO.

kw.name: And Input Password
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing password into text field 'id: register-confirm-pass'.
Temporally setting log level to: NONE
Log level changed from NONE to INFO.

kw.name: And Select From List By Label
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``labels``.
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'id: register-user-type' by label Pessoa Jurídica.

kw.name: And Submit Form
kw.doc: Submits a form identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Submitting form 'name: register'.

kw.name: Then Wait Until Page Contains
kw.arg: Lorem ipsum LTDA, teu cadastro foi realizado com sucesso!
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.
kw.msg: Text 'Lorem ipsum LTDA, teu cadastro foi realizado com sucesso!' did not appear in 5 seconds.

kw.name: And Page Should Contain Link
kw.doc: Verifies link identified by ``locator`` is found from current page.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.status: Text 'Lorem ipsum LTDA, teu cadastro foi realizado com sucesso!' did not appear in 5 seconds.

suite.doc: Como cliente da loja virtual, desejo criar um cadastro no sistema para poder visualizar meus pedidos e lista de desejos.
